title: Proposal: Automated Testing Suite for Trading Agents

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Creation and Implementation of Automated Testing Suite for Trading Agents. This proposal addresses the urgent need to mitigate system instability highlighted by Evolutionary Axiom 2026-01-15 and the observed AgentGladiator instability. The testing suite will encompass rigorous and automated tests to ensure all agents meet performance and stability standards before operational deployment. This will reduce failures, improve system reliability, and enhance overall capital efficiency. Resources should be prioritized for this initiative before exploration of potential enhancements outlined in the Wolfram DEEP DIVE REPORT.
